mapper.select: select nvl(max(co_num),0) from cp_original
select nvl(max(cv_num),0) from cp_vertuo
select nvl(max(mo_num),0) from ms_original
select nvl(max(mv_num),0) from ms_vertuo
select nvl(max(ao_num),0) from ao_original
select co_num,co_listCoffee,co_modelName1,co_listContent,co_cupSize1,co_cupSize2,co_cupSize3, co_price,co_sleevePrice,co_sp1,co_sp2,co_sp3 from cp_original where co_type='슬리브팩' order by co_num asc

select co_num,co_listCoffee,co_modelName1,co_listContent,co_cupSize1,co_cupSize2,co_cupSize3, co_price,co_sleevePrice,co_sp1,co_sp2,co_sp3 from cp_original where co_type='바리스타 크리에이션' order by co_num asc

select co_num,co_listCoffee,co_modelName1,co_listContent,co_cupSize1,co_cupSize2,co_cupSize3, co_price,co_sleevePrice,co_sp1,co_sp2,co_sp3,co_intensity from cp_original where co_type='마스터 오리진' order by co_num asc

select co_num,co_listCoffee,co_modelName1,co_listContent,co_cupSize1,co_cupSize2,co_cupSize3, co_price,co_sleevePrice,co_sp1,co_sp2,co_sp3,co_intensity from cp_original where co_type='월드 익스플로레이션' order by co_num asc

select co_num,co_listCoffee,co_modelName1,co_listContent,co_cupSize1,co_cupSize2,co_cupSize3, co_price,co_sleevePrice,co_sp1,co_sp2,co_sp3,co_intensity from cp_original where co_type='이스피라치오네 이탈리아나' order by co_num asc

select co_num,co_listCoffee,co_modelName1,co_listContent,co_cupSize1,co_cupSize2,co_cupSize3, co_price,co_sleevePrice,co_sp1,co_sp2,co_sp3,co_intensity from cp_original where co_type='에스프레소' order by co_num asc
select cv_num,cv_listCoffee,cv_modelName1,cv_cupSize1,cv_cupSize2,cv_cupSize3, cv_cupSize4,cv_cupSize5,cv_price from cp_vertuo where cv_type='슬리브팩' order by cv_num asc

select cv_num,cv_listCoffee,cv_modelName1,cv_listContent,cv_cupSize1,cv_cupSize2,cv_cupSize3, cv_price,cv_sleevePrice,cv_sp1,cv_sp2,cv_sp3 from cp_vertuo where cv_type='바리스타 크리에이션' order by cv_num asc
select cv_num,cv_listCoffee,cv_modelName1,cv_listContent,cv_cupSize1,cv_cupSize2,cv_cupSize3, cv_price,cv_sleevePrice,cv_intensity from cp_vertuo where cv_type='마스터 오리진' order by cv_num asc
select cv_num,cv_listCoffee,cv_modelName1,cv_listContent,cv_cupSize1,cv_cupSize2,cv_cupSize3, cv_price,cv_sleevePrice,cv_intensity from cp_vertuo where cv_type='머그' order by cv_num asc
select cv_num,cv_listCoffee,cv_modelName1,cv_listContent,cv_cupSize1,cv_cupSize2,cv_cupSize3, cv_price,cv_sleevePrice,cv_intensity from cp_vertuo where cv_type='에스프레소' order by cv_num asc
select cv_num,cv_listCoffee,cv_modelName1,cv_listContent,cv_cupSize1,cv_cupSize2,cv_cupSize3, cv_price,cv_sleevePrice,cv_intensity from cp_vertuo where cv_type='더블 에스프레소' order by cv_num asc
select cv_num,cv_listCoffee,cv_modelName1,cv_listContent,cv_cupSize1,cv_cupSize2,cv_cupSize3, cv_price,cv_sleevePrice,cv_intensity from cp_vertuo where cv_type='알토' order by cv_num asc
select cv_num,cv_listCoffee,cv_modelName1,cv_listContent,cv_cupSize1,cv_cupSize2,cv_cupSize3, cv_price,cv_sleevePrice,cv_intensity from cp_vertuo where cv_type='그랑 룽고' order by cv_num asc
select mo_num,mo_modelName1,mo_listMachine,mo_listContent,mo_price from ms_original where rowid in (select max(rowid) from ms_original group by mo_modelName1) order by mo_num asc
select mv_num,mv_modelName1,mv_listMachine,mv_listContent,mv_price from ms_vertuo where rowid in (select max(rowid) from ms_vertuo group by mv_modelName1) order by mv_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='네스프레소 x 키아라 페라니 한정판 컬렉션' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='같이 만드는 그린 모먼트' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='에어로치노' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='스낵 및 소품' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='루메 컬렉션' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='노마드 컬렉션' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='뷰 컬렉션' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='보틀' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='버츄오 컬렉션' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='오리진 컬렉션' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='퓨어 컬렉션' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='터치 컬렉션' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='픽시 컬렉션' order by ao_num asc

select ao_num,ao_type,ao_modelName,ao_listAcc,ao_price,ao_quantity,ao_atAcc1,ao_atAcc2,ao_atAcc3,ao_atAcc4,ao_atAcc5, ao_atContent1,ao_atContent2,ao_atContent3,ao_atContent4,ao_atContent5,ao_atContent6,ao_atContent7,ao_atContent8,ao_atContent9,ao_bg from acc_original where ao_type='리빌 컬렉션' order by ao_num asc

select co_num,co_type,co_modelName1,co_modelName2,co_listCoffee,co_listContent,co_price,co_sleevePrice,co_quantity, co_intensity,co_intensity2,co_profile,co_notes,co_origin,co_cupSize1,co_cupSize2,co_cupSize3,co_cupSize4,co_cupSize5,co_cupSize6,co_sp1,co_sp2,co_sp3, co_aticleCoffee1,co_aticleCoffee2,co_aticleCoffee3,co_aticleCoffee4,co_aticleCoffee5,co_longContent,co_bg,co_bgColor,co_bigName1,co_bigName2, co_atContent1,co_atContent2,co_atContent3,co_atContent4,co_atContent5,co_atContent6,co_atContent7,co_atContent8,co_atContent9,co_atContent10, co_atContent11,co_atContent12,co_roastiness1,co_roastiness2,co_acidity1,co_acidity2,co_bitterness1,co_bitterness2,co_body1,co_body2, co_atOrigin,co_atRoasting,co_atProfile,co_gram,co_coffee from cp_original where co_num=#{co_num}

select cv_num,cv_type,cv_modelName1,cv_modelName2,cv_listCoffee,cv_listContent,cv_price,cv_sleevePrice,cv_quantity, cv_intensity,cv_intensity2,cv_profile,cv_notes,cv_origin,cv_cupSize1,cv_cupSize2,cv_cupSize3,cv_cupSize4,cv_cupSize5,cv_cupSize6,cv_cupSize7,cv_cupSize8, cv_cupSize9,cv_cupSize10,cv_sp1,cv_sp2,cv_sp3,cv_sp4,cv_sp5,cv_aticleCoffee1,cv_aticleCoffee2,cv_aticleCoffee3,cv_aticleCoffee4,cv_aticleCoffee5, cv_shortContent,cv_longContent,cv_bg,cv_bgColor,cv_bigName1,cv_bigName2,cv_atContent1,cv_atContent2,cv_atContent3,cv_atContent4,cv_atContent5,cv_atContent6, cv_atContent7,cv_atContent8,cv_atContent9,cv_atContent10,cv_atContent11,cv_atContent12,cv_atContent13,cv_roastiness1,cv_roastiness2,cv_acidity1, cv_acidity2,cv_bitterness1,cv_bitterness2,cv_body1,cv_body2,cv_atOrigin,cv_atRoasting,cv_atProfile,cv_gram,cv_coffee from cp_vertuo where cv_num=#{cv_num}

select mo_num,mo_modelName1,mo_modelName2,mo_modelName3,mo_listMachine,mo_listContent,mo_price,mo_quantity,mo_atMachine1,mo_atMachine2,mo_atMachine3, mo_atMachine4,mo_atMachine5,mo_atMachine6,mo_atMachine7,mo_atMachine8,mo_atMachine9,mo_atMachine10,mo_atMachine11,mo_atMachine12,mo_sp1,mo_sp2,mo_sp3, mo_sp4,mo_sp5,mo_sp6,mo_sp7,mo_atContent1,mo_atContent2,mo_weight,mo_waterTank,mo_milkContainer,mo_container,mo_warranty,mo_size1,mo_size2,mo_color, mo_made,mo_info1,mo_info2,mo_info3,mo_info4,mo_info5,mo_info6,mo_info7,mo_info8,mo_info9 from ms_original where mo_num=#{mo_num}

select mv_num,mv_modelName1,mv_modelName2,mv_modelName3,mv_listMachine,mv_listContent,mv_price,mv_quantity,mv_atMachine1,mv_atMachine2, mv_atMachine3,mv_atMachine4,mv_atMachine5,mv_atMachine6,mv_atMachine7,mv_atMachine8,mv_atMachine9,mv_sp1,mv_sp2,mv_sp3,mv_sp4,mv_sp5, mv_atContent1,mv_atContent2,mv_weight,mv_waterTank,mv_container,mv_warranty,mv_size1,mv_size2,mv_color,mv_made,mv_info1,mv_info2,mv_info3, mv_info4,mv_info5,mv_info6,mv_info7,mv_info8,mv_info9 from ms_vertuo where mv_num=#{mv_num}
